name: fL♡ա㉹r ɱĨᖆᖆōᖆ
description: Flower Mirror attempts to recreate the iridescent effect that is trendy in textiles & femme consumerism. Hinting at selfie culture, the obsession of staring at oneself's beauty in the front-facing camera is similar to the obsession of staring at iridescent objects. Try it out in fullscreen. You can zoom, spin & move around the flowers. fL♡ա㉹r ɱĨᖆᖆōᖆ was made for The Wrong Biennale "INTERNET FAME" Pavillion & shown at Panke Gallery Berlin for Transmediale Vorspiele 2018.
